1133311111111111121.content:
Nearly a month of filming had gone by. The brothers didnt realize how fast the time went by. By the end of filming it was the end of July. It was July 30th 2011. The boys had made friends with their co-starts and even their boss Kyle. In the past month, the boys didnt gain much at all. In fact, they lost 5 pounds each. Dylan was back to his original weight of 155 and Cole was 155 as well. But now it was the end of filiming and Kyle wanted to see the boys after the last scene was shot.

After the last scene was shot the boys went to see Kyle.

"Whats up Kyle?" Dylan asked.

"You know whats up, youve lost weight havent you?" Kyle sounded frustrated.

"Yes," Dylan began. "But its only becuase weve been running around filming all this time. And all the stuff we have to do outside of work is hard too. Weve gotta go to all the cast conventions, advertise, lots of photo shoots. Its exhausting, theres not as much time to eat... And we havent seen are family for like 2 months now."

"Ok, I understand. But, the writes have interesting plans for your characters for season 2. Theyre going to make you indespensible to the show. Now you have a bit of a break, for the next month, the film is going to go through massive editing. Then it will be finilized and aired in October. We have to see the audiences reaction before we can begin filming a second season. If the audience hates it,the show will be cut from the network, and we will all be out of a job. But I think were in a good position. I think this show will be somehting unlike the audience has seen before. Over the break i want you too relax and be with your friends and family, and most importantly, eat! If we get renewed for a second season, then filming will begin in December! I will call you to let you know."

"Well thanks Kyle, it was a fun month." Cole added, "And i liked the cliffhanger you left our characters in."

In their last scene, Coles character Cody and Dylans character Dallas were in a huge car accident.

"Yeah, that was fun to film. You guys probably never shot an explosive scene like that over at Disney have you?" Kyle asked, then added, "I have the first draft of the script right here if you guys want to leave with it. Oh and by the way, when you come back here in December I want you both weighing in at 180 pounds!"

Cole grew excited in his head, but didnt want to let Kyle know.

"Now, if gaining is going to be a problem we still have those pills---"

"NO WE WILL EAT!..." Cole interrupted a little excidedly.

"So we have to gain 25 pounds by December?" Dylan asked. "No problem, see you Kyle." And the boys left with the rough draft of the script.

"Woo gaining again!" Cole told his brother was he got into his car.

"I know," Dylan added, "want to go out for a celebratory dinner?"

"You know it!" Cole answered. "Where to?"
